#summary Describes this project.

= Introduction =

This project contains a collection of components/composites that are too small or simple to be contained within their own project/system. They are used by other projects in the oppna-program suite.


= Details =

These are the components contained within this project.

*commons-util-core-bc-composite-svc-ldap (LDAP client)

*commons-util-core-bc-composite-svc-pivotaltracker (Pivotal Tracker Client)

*commons-util-core-bc-composite-svc-usd (USD client)
